insert into t_my_linkman (name, my_client_ids, my_client_names, duty, mobile, mail, birthday, sex, province, city, county, detail_address, remark, company_id) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{myClientIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{myClientNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update t_my_linkman set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, my_client_ids = #{myClientIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, my_client_names = #{myClientNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duty = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail_address = #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where my_linkman_id = #{myLinkmanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select my_linkman_id, name, my_client_ids, my_client_names, duty, mobile, mail, birthday, sex, province, city, county, detail_address, remark, company_id from t_my_linkman where my_linkman_id = #{myLinkmanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
